frontmatter.titlepage:
Olive Family Genealogy Notes, n.d.
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2012-086
Special Collections, Virginia Tech 2013 &contact;
Processed by: Tyler Dodson, Student Assistant, and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,
Special Collections

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection consists of a daybook containing the notes from a genealogy on the Olive Family.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Olive Family Genealogy Notes must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Olive Family Genealogy Notes, Ms2012-086, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was acquired by Special Collections prior to 2008.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Olive Family Genealogy Notes was completed in January 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a daybook containing the notes from a genealogy on the Olive Family. The focus of the notes are mainly on James, William, Isham, James Berry, and Dorothy Olive, but other names mentioned include Wilbarger, Pugh, McFarland, Utley, Carter, and Taylor.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This daybook was found in a box titled Gallaher Family, with two other ledgers: Hite Family Genealogy Notes (Ms2012-083), and Household Management Ledger (Ms2012-085). No obvious connection could be found between the three ledgers, so they were processed as separate collections.
